import React, { useState } from 'react' import { format } from 'date-fns' import { enGB } from 'date-fns/locale' import { DatePickerCalendar } from 'react-nice-dates' import 'react-nice-dates/build/style.css' function Calendar() { const [date, setDate] = useState() return (

Selected date: {date ? format(date, 'dd MMM yyyy', { locale: enGB }) : 'none'}.

) } export default Calendar
